00030 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00031 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00032 from PyQt4.uic import *
00033 from Koo.Common import Common
00034 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldWidget import *
00035 
00036 (RichTextFieldWidgetUi, RichTextFieldWidgetBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('richtext.ui') ) 
00037 
00038 class RichTextFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget, RichTextFieldWidgetUi):
00039         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00040                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00041                 RichTextFieldWidgetUi.__init__(self)
00042                 self.setupUi(self)
00043 
00044                 self.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Expanding, QSizePolicy.Expanding )
00045                 self.installPopupMenu( self.uiText )
00046 
00047                 self.connect( self.pushBold, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.bold )
00048                 self.connect( self.pushItalic, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.italic )
00049                 self.connect( self.pushUnderline, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.underline )
00050                 self.connect( self.pushStrike, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.strike )
00051                 self.connect( self.pushLeftJustify, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.leftJustify )
00052                 self.connect( self.pushCenter, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.center )
00053                 self.connect( self.pushRightJustify, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.rightJustify )
00054                 self.connect( self.pushJustify, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.justify )
00055                 self.connect( self.pushForegroundColor, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.foregroundColor )
00056                 self.connect( self.pushBackgroundColor, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.backgroundColor )
00057                 self.connect( self.uiFont, SIGNAL('currentFontChanged(QFont)'), self.font )
00058                 self.connect( self.uiFontSize, SIGNAL('valueChanged(int)'), self.fontSize )
00059                 self.connect( self.uiText, SIGNAL('cursorPositionChanged()'), self.cursorPosition)
00060 
00061                 self.updateFont = True
00062                 font = self.uiText.document().defaultFont()
00063                 self.font( font )
00064                 self.fontSize( font.pointSize() )
00065 
00066         def updateCurrentColors(self):
00067                 cursor = self.uiText.textCursor()
00068                 format = cursor.charFormat()
00069                 # Foreground color
00070                 p = QPixmap( QSize(40, 10) )
00071                 p.fill( format.foreground().color() )
00072                 self.pushForegroundColor.setIcon( QIcon(p) )
00073                 # Background color
00074                 p = QPixmap( QSize(40, 40) )
00075                 p.fill( format.background().color() )
00076                 self.pushBackgroundColor.setIcon( QIcon(p) )
00077                 
00078         def foregroundColor(self):
00079                 cursor = self.uiText.textCursor()
00080                 format = cursor.charFormat()
00081                 color = QColorDialog.getColor( format.foreground().color(), self )
00082                 format.setForeground( QBrush( color ) )
00083                 cursor.setCharFormat( format )
00084                 self.uiText.setTextCursor( cursor )
00085                 self.uiText.setFocus()
00086                 self.updateCurrentColors()
00087 
00088         def backgroundColor(self):
00089                 cursor = self.uiText.textCursor()
00090                 format = cursor.charFormat()
00091                 color = QColorDialog.getColor( format.background().color(), self )
00092                 format.setBackground( QBrush( color ) )
00093                 cursor.setCharFormat( format )
00094                 self.uiText.setTextCursor( cursor )
00095                 self.uiText.setFocus()
00096                 self.updateCurrentColors()
00097                 
00098         def cursorPosition(self):
00099                 align = self.uiText.alignment() 
00100                 if align == Qt.AlignLeft:
00101                         self.pushLeftJustify.setChecked( True )
00102                 elif align == Qt.AlignHCenter:
00103                         self.pushCenter.setChecked( True )
00104                 elif align == Qt.AlignRight:
00105                         self.pushRightJustify.setChecked( True )
00106                 else:
00107                         self.pushJustify.setChecked( True )
00108                 self.charFormatChanged( self.uiText.currentCharFormat() )
00109 
00110         def charFormatChanged(self, format):
00111                 font = format.font()
00112                 self.updateFont = False
00113                 self.uiFont.setCurrentFont( font )
00114                 self.uiFontSize.setValue( font.pointSize() )
00115                 self.pushBold.setChecked( font.weight() == QFont.Bold )
00116                 self.pushUnderline.setChecked( font.underline() )
00117                 self.pushItalic.setChecked( font.italic() )
00118                 self.pushStrike.setChecked( font.strikeOut() )
00119                 self.updateCurrentColors()
00120                 self.updateFont = True
00121 
00122         def fontSize(self, size):
00123                 if not self.updateFont:
00124                         return
00125                 cursor = self.uiText.textCursor()
00126                 format = cursor.charFormat()
00127                 format.setFontPointSize( size )
00128                 cursor.setCharFormat( format )
00129                 self.uiText.setTextCursor( cursor )
00130                 self.uiText.setFocus()
00131 
00132         def font(self, font):
00133                 if not self.updateFont:
00134                         return
00135                 cursor = self.uiText.textCursor()
00136                 format = cursor.charFormat()
00137                 format.setFont( font )
00138                 cursor.setCharFormat( format )
00139                 self.uiText.setTextCursor( cursor )
00140                 self.uiText.setFocus()
00141                 
00142         def bold(self):
00143                 cursor = self.uiText.textCursor()
00144                 format = cursor.charFormat()
00145                 if format.fontWeight() == QFont.Bold:
00146                         format.setFontWeight( QFont.Normal )
00147                 else:
00148                         format.setFontWeight( QFont.Bold )
00149                 cursor.setCharFormat( format )
00150                 self.uiText.setTextCursor( cursor )
00151                 self.uiText.setFocus()
00152 
00153         def italic(self):
00154                 cursor = self.uiText.textCursor()
00155                 format = cursor.charFormat()
00156                 format.setFontItalic( not format.fontItalic() )
00157                 cursor.setCharFormat( format )
00158                 self.uiText.setTextCursor( cursor )
00159                 self.uiText.setFocus()
00160 
00161         def underline(self):
00162                 cursor = self.uiText.textCursor()
00163                 format = cursor.charFormat()
00164                 format.setFontUnderline( not format.fontUnderline() )
00165                 cursor.setCharFormat( format )
00166                 self.uiText.setTextCursor( cursor )
00167                 self.uiText.setFocus()
00168 
00169         def strike(self):
00170                 cursor = self.uiText.textCursor()
00171                 format = cursor.charFormat()
00172                 format.setFontStrikeOut( not format.fontStrikeOut() )
00173                 cursor.setCharFormat( format )
00174                 self.uiText.setTextCursor( cursor )
00175                 self.uiText.setFocus()
00176 
00177         def leftJustify(self):
00178                 self.setAlignment( Qt.AlignLeft )
00179 
00180         def center(self):
00181                 self.setAlignment( Qt.AlignHCenter )
00182 
00183         def rightJustify(self):
00184                 self.setAlignment( Qt.AlignRight )
00185 
00186         def justify(self):
00187                 self.setAlignment( Qt.AlignJustify )
00188 
00189         def setAlignment(self, align):
00190                 cursor = self.uiText.textCursor()
00191                 format = cursor.blockFormat()
00192                 format.setAlignment( align )
00193                 cursor.setBlockFormat( format )
00194                 self.uiText.setTextCursor( cursor )
00195                 self.uiText.setFocus()
00196                 
00197         def setReadOnly(self, value):
00198                 self.uiText.setReadOnly( value )
00199 
00200         def colorWidget(self):
00201                 return self.uiText
00202 
00203         def store(self):
00204                 # As the HTML returned can be different than the one we set in 
00205                 # showValue() even if the text hasn't been modified by the user
00206                 # we need to track modifications using QTextDocument property
00207                 if self.uiText.document().isModified():
00208                         self.record.setValue(self.name, unicode( self.uiText.document().toHtml() ) or False )
00209 
00210         def clear(self):
00211                 self.uiText.setHtml('')
00212 
00213         def showValue(self):
00214                 value = self.record.value(self.name)
00215                 if not value:
00216                         value=''
00217                 self.uiText.setHtml( value )
00218                 # As the HTML returned can be different than the one we set in 
00219                 # showValue() even if the text hasn't been modified by the user
00220                 # we need to track modifications using QTextDocument property
00221                 self.uiText.document().setModified( False )
